summary: The document is a form or record associated with the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, detailing procedures for the establishment and management of official cover. It includes instructions for submitting various forms to change or update cover status, operational details, and limitations, along with a section for remarks and cover history from 1962 to 1977.
key_findings: The document is associated with the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It outlines procedures for submitting forms to establish or change official cover status.
Includes a cover history section detailing operational covers from 1962 to 1977.
References specific forms and regulations for managing cover status and operational details.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992
